INSERT INTO CART ( CART_SEQ, USER_ID, CART_GUESTS_NUM, CART_TOTAL_AMT, REG_DT, UPDATE_DT, ROOM_TYPE_SEQ, CART_CHECK_IN_DT, CART_CHECK_OUT_DT, CART_CHECK_IN_TIME, CART_CHECK_OUT_TIME ) VALUES ( #{cartSeq}, #{userId}, #{cartGuestsNum}, #{cartTotalAmt}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{roomTypeSeq}, #{cartCheckInDt}, #{cartCheckOutDt}, #{cartCheckInTime}, #{cartCheckOutTime} )
mapper.select:
SELECT A.CART_SEQ, A.USER_ID, A.REG_DT, A.ROOM_TYPE_SEQ, A.CART_CHECK_IN_DT, A.CART_CHECK_OUT_DT, A.CART_CHECK_IN_TIME, A.CART_CHECK_OUT_TIME, A.CART_GUESTS_NUM, A.CART_TOTAL_AMT,
B.ROOM_TYPE_TITLE, B.MAX_GUESTS,
C.ROOM_TYPE_IMG_NAME,
D.ROOM_TITLE, D.ROOM_ADDR, D.CANCEL_POLICY,
E.ROOM_CAT_NAME
FROM CART A, ROOM_TYPE B, ROOM_TYPE_IMAGE C, ROOM D, ROOM_CATEGORY E WHERE USER_ID = #{value} AND A.ROOM_TYPE_SEQ = B.ROOM_TYPE_SEQ AND B.ROOM_TYPE_SEQ = C.ROOM_TYPE_SEQ AND D.ROOM_SEQ = B.ROOM_SEQ AND D.ROOM_CAT_SEQ = E.ROOM_CAT_SEQ AND C.IMG_TYPE = 'main' ORDER BY REG_DT DESC
